EmailTemplate.description: Account Manager doesn't have permissions to create the contract request
EmailTemplate.name: CLM AM Dont have permission creating Contract request
EmailTemplate.subject: Contract Request creation failed for the opportunity {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Owner_Name__c},
The contract request creation has failed for the opportunity {!Opportunity.Name}. Try creating the request manually. If you are still unable to create, contact the CLM Administrator.
Click here to go the opportunity.
Thanks
